content: the arvensis headband is a simple 1 row repeat that creates a stylish headband for the cold season it features the arvensis stitch but all you need to know is how to half_double_crochet this crochet pattern includes video tutorials on the arvensis stitch and how to seam the headband to create the top knot if you need any help with this crochet pattern or sizing please email joanna at hello@highdesertyarn com what makes this crochet pattern awesome * designed to relax you while you crochet * includes video tutorials for the main stitches used in the pattern * comes with 100% designer support if you get stuck **materials** yarn - worsted weight/category 4 you will need 70-173 yds total see size chart for approx yardage substitutes any other worsted/category 4 yarn will work crochet hook - j/10 6 00mm or correct hook to meet gauge scissors tapestry needle tape measure **experience level = advanced beginner ** you will need to have an understanding of the half_double_crochet and placing stitches between the posts of stitches **gauge stitch pattern** is included in the pdf or you can view the free pattern version on my blog if you have any questions please send an email to hello@highdesertyarn com i d love to help you interested in joining this yarny adventure with me follow this link to subscribe to my newsletter -- https //www subscribepage com/b7e4g5 follow me on instagram @highdesertyarn find me on facebook @highdesertyarn check out my blog http //www highdesertyarn com
